info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas...
Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam affecting Union and Ashley Counties.
For the Ouachita River...including Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Monroe, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ouachita River at Felsenthal Lock and Dam.
* WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 66.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 65.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening and continue rising to 72.8 feet Friday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 70.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 72.5 feet on 02/03/1995. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Monday evening at 1115 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
